timeline.bodyText:
@danielezonca
Just out of curiosity: what are those two configurations
addonsConfig.useMonitoring()
addonsConfig.withMonitoring(true).useMonitoring()
, and why they should be different in the test ?
timeline.author: gitgabrio

replies.bodyText:
@gitgabrio
As far as I remember useMonitoring() is the getter while withMonitoring(...) is the setter. Btw I just took a test and made it fail to see the output of the build so I don't know the details of that class
replies.author: danielezonca
